pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Tabulation with Stata-Like Output // Efficient tabulation with Stata-like output. For each unique value of the variable, it shows the number of observations with that value, proportion of observations with that value, and cumulative proportion, in descending order of frequency. Accepts data.table, tibble, or data.frame as input. Efficient with big data: if you give it a data.table, tab() uses data.table syntax.
